divs: Sighting Detailslooking west,from forbes creek hill in juanita area at 9pm. moving ne very slowly at what appeared to be under 10k feet. Very quiet, large object (size of jupiter in the sky) slowly flew across the sky in a 4 min time period. object then went out on itself into a ever dwindling circle. sphere has reappeared in the sky where it vanished(ne towards mt baker),only now its smaller while flashing a red twinkle and staying in one spot. This is the second time this summer this has happened. Either its like the movie "knowing" or we are testing out new stuff to use on iran i was able to record it on my cell phone.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Kirkland
There were no other sightings in Kirkland on or around September 11th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright sphere that was orangeish white flies over Seattle suburb
